header.gameNote: EAST REGION AT OKLAHOMA CITY OK

article.description:
Joe Shipp scored 24 points and Richard
Midgley hit a 3-pointer late in overtime to lift
California.

article.headline: Cal one-ups late Wolfpack score to advance

images.name: Midgley_Richard 032003 inline
images.caption: California's Richard Midgley celebrates with teammates A.J. Diggs and Joe Shipp after overtime win.

article.linkText: Midgley sticks late 3 in OT to lift Cal past N.C. State
article.story: RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) -- Marcus Melvin scored 16 points, and Julius Hodge and Scooter Sherrill each added 14, leading No. 24 North Carolina State to a 74-66 exhibition victory over Global Sports on Tuesday night. The Wolfpack shot just 32 percent from the field and made 11 of 36 3-pointers, but were 23-for-25 from the foul line and had only nine turnovers. N.C. State opens the regular season Nov. 21 against North Carolina-Asheville at home. Wolfpack coach Herb Sendek said reserve guard Cameron Bennerman, who broke a bone in his shooting hand Oct. 24, has been practicing with a splint and could be ready to play against Asheville.
